headline: Comcast hopes bold offer will lure back frustrated customers
summary: Comcast, which sells phone, cable TV and internet services under the name Xfinity, is losing its grip in two vital areas of the telecom industry, despite recent efforts to outpace its rising number of competitors. However, it is betting big on a bold offer to help it take on recent challenges in ...
